title: Draft Reactions and Way-Too-Early Predictions With Mike Lombardi and Kevin Clark (Ep. 105)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Mike Lombardi huddle up to discuss good value picks in the third and fourth rounds (03:00), the San Francisco 49ers' good fortune (05:00), and John Ross (12:00). Then Kevin Clark joins the show to discuss the most improved teams (21:00), and the gang wraps up with their "Way-Too-Early Predictions" (36:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
